author: alita85
content: <@!543900561460822016> <@!301186049323958275> <@!489256758989029405> <@!360491619402776577> , I'm working with <@!181920051333431296> right now on the JSON RPC, and he's curious if someone would be free for a 15 minute crash course on how to setup a private test network / test node for a client? I can also do this, but I'm not extremely well versed yet and I think getting more info from those with direct experience with clients would be useful. <@!543900561460822016> if you'd be wiling that would be very helpful because Jared is currently using geth.

author: timbeiko
content: <@!104006934562107392> not sure if this is helpful, but Besu had a tutorial: https://besu.hyperledger.org/en/stable/Tutorials/Private-Network/Create-Private-Network/

author: timbeiko
content: I suspect it's pretty similar with Geth
